title: Grace's Dream Come True as Miss England
summary: Grace Richardson, a 20-year-old from Leicester, has become the first openly gay Miss England. She was bullied a lot in school for being gay and for her appearance, but she didn't let that stop her. Grace entered the Miss England competition and won by singing a song from The Greatest Showman. She is very proud and says she has achieved her dream. Now, she will represent England in the Miss World competition in 2026. Her story shows that you can overcome bullying and succeed if you believe in yourself.

background_read: Miss England is a beauty pageant in England where women compete for a crown. Grace Richardson is a student who loves musical theatre. She faced bullying for being gay but stayed strong. Winning Miss England means she can inspire others and compete in Miss World, a big international competition.
Article_Structure: WHO: Grace Richardson, a 20-year-old student from Leicester
WHAT: She became the first openly gay Miss England by winning a competition
WHERE: The event happened in Wolverhampton, England
WHY: To achieve her dream and show that bullying can be overcome

perspectives.description: Grace's story is about overcoming bullying and achieving success through perseverance.
As the first openly gay Miss England, she represents diversity and inclusion in beauty pageants.
